html:
6.19.20  7:22 pm   Could you put out some music soon?

      sure

6.19.20  6:11 pm   What do you think about walls

      they seem so real

6.19.20  5:53 pm   is a new video coming

      yes but way more

6.19.20  4:23 pm   do you ever think about the inevitable heat death of the entire universe?

      never heard of it

6.19.20  4:17 pm   should i give up on a crazy idea i have to focus on things that actually matter?

      i have some convenient news for you, some of the things that actually matter are crazy

6.19.20  4:16 pm   Will You Only Intend On Doing Songs, or Will You Do Other Things, Bill Wurtz

      Songs And Other Things Both, Together Intertwined And Mingled

6.19.20  3:58 pm   whats the absolute state of mango

      mango

6.19.20  2:57 pm   when is the velcro episode?

      going to hopefully be able to incorporate velcro into every episode

6.19.20  2:23 pm   What do you think about watermelons?

      too much water for a melon, too much melon for water

6.19.20  2:17 pm   what do you think about Oklahoma?

      not only Big, but also Friendly

6.19.20  2:01 pm   What is the best music you've made in your opinion?

      i would prefer to make some new music to be my favorite

6.19.20  1:27 pm   Whenever I think of a ridiculous action, I know that it has been done before because more than about 50 Billion people have lived on this earth, thoughts?

      50 billion is still way less than even just the amount of normal actions there are

6.19.20  12:49 pm   Are you an ostrich?

     no

     If so, why?

     i'm not sure

6.19.20  12:13 pm   how come your songs make sense and dont at the same time

      they are a ploy to exercise YOUR ability to make sense

6.19.20  11:22 am   Why is there no lifetime participation awards

      the award is life itself. you've already won that one, but you can keep winning it more and more if you prefer

6.19.20  10:07 am   I can't stop hearing Mount St. Helens is about to blow up what should I do?

      try starting to hear another song

6.19.20  8:45 am   people say i'm bad at singing but I'm trying my best! how do I get better at singing for other people to be okay with my songs in which I sing.

     forget that, start with getting ok with it yourself

      Other than doing singing more which is already on the itinerary. 

     you have to mean what you are singing. so, an interesting trick sometimes is to improvise the lyrics. it's like in conversation, when you have a conversation, you are improvising the words. that sounds normal and good, where as if you read a transcript instead, you are reading someone else's words from a different time and place, and it usually sounds fake and wrong. it would take some strong acting skills to actually convince yourself that those words are real at the time you are saying them. but that's really the only way to get the voice to sound any good. is if your brain thinks you mean what you are saying. so the best fast-track to this vocal state, might be to improvise the lyrics. could be worth looking into. if you get used to how that feels, this might help you conjure up a similar experience somehow, even when you have to be on script

6.19.20  8:20 am   bill are you anime girl 

      no but i can see why you would think that

6.19.20  6:59 am   Do you have something against capital letters? 

      no, that wouldn't make sense. i use them all the time

6.19.20  6:29 am   how do i resist the human need to categorize everything? i want to stop but it's very difficult 

      just do it but do it crazier. have some fun

6.19.20  6:19 am   i don't have enough RAM

      no matter how much you get, you may always feel this way

6.19.20  5:43 am   Hey, so, I entered a really big prestigious contest and didn't win. and that's fine, but I feel empty now, because I have nothing else to look forward to. Where should I go from here?

      have you thought about ushering in a new era

6.19.20  5:26 am   I need help with my maths homework, what's infinity + 14?

      might be just enough

6.19.20  5:19 am   What's the difference between fruits and vegetables?

      they're pretty much the same

6.19.20  4:30 am   what is the answer to life, the universe and everything?

      could be you

6.19.20  3:38 am   Is the right number of videos you are making 0?

      no that's way off

6.19.20  3:04 am   How big is the biggest theoretically possible sandwich?

      how big you want it

6.19.20  3:00 am   Thank you Bill for bringing some happiness to my life. Your videos and songs helped me get through a rough patch in my life and are bringing me through to a hopefully better part. You have answered my question and taught me better than my teachers and been there more for me than my friends. Thank you so much for creating and being there for me

      holy appointed town cartographer you are very friendly

6.19.20  2:18 am   What was the bad thing you did?

      was working on a cure for a new disease i had invented, and accidentally spilled the disease before making the cure

6.19.20  2:13 am   is a valid description of your content, "controlled chaos"?

      no

6.19.20  1:59 am   You said the melody for 'might quit' came from a dream. How do I have a dream?

      usually the dream decides to have you

6.19.20  1:50 am   What is a black hole?

      could be like a casual hang out venue

6.19.20  1:42 am   What new video ideas are brewing up in that big brain of yours?

      was hoping to save the world some how

6.19.20  1:32 am   Wait a minute, so if reinventing the graphics department wasn't planned, and Might Quit was based off of a dream... does that mean the posting of that video followed by taking a break from posting was completely unrelated?

     of course

     I had assumed that it was meant to be a little troll but I guess not?

      of course not. (the song was actually supposed to be called "it's the first day of school", but then i decided i'd rather not have something that sounds like such a nursery rhyme. especially after recently releasing 'at the airport terminal' which nearly actually is a nursery rhyme) At the time i was positively sure i was finally going to succeed at doing a 1 week schedule, which i had been pushing fervently for for several months already, and i wrote the next song extremely fast, pretty much on pace for 1 week schedule, but, as always, a couple days into song production i realized that 1 week is wildly impossible, as always. so then, as usual, taking it slightly slower, did some re-writes, and finished the recording in an average amount of time (similar production time as the previous 2 songs) but then, when i started on the video, let's just say there was a little tickle in my mind that was possibly trying to get my attention during the entire 2-week blitz schedule but knew it wasn't welcome, because in the 2 week schedule it would have been impossible..... but i decided to listsen to it, this time. and what the voice was saying is, 'one of these days you should actually START a video in 3D instead of just sprinkling little bits of 3D in. or else you're never going to really get any better at it.' so i did it for half a scene and it blew my mind, then did it for a couple more half scenes, and it changed my life

6.19.20  1:05 am   Do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky?

      that reminds me of something in the future

6.18.20  11:52 pm   Is there a way to transcend time and space itself?

      yes, that is the recommended approach

6.18.20  11:52 pm   What are you planning to do?

      to put it in terms of cereal ....... imagine i'm planning to produce every kind of cereal including some of the ones you may have only dreamed about

6.18.20  11:09 pm   Is Wyoming real?

      it becomes real if you can find all 4 corners of it

6.18.20  10:55 pm   how do i become a dolphin 

      you could look at a banana, for inspiration

6.18.20  10:22 pm   if all I want is to write a song, is that so wrong?

      should be an interesting mix of right and wrong

6.18.20  9:48 pm   Are the notes in your chords sometimes a little closer together than one might expect, or are they all regular?

     remind me again what regular is

     I hear nice close vocal harmonies in a few of your songs and like them

6.18.20  9:26 pm   So you like music huh?

      could come in handy

6.18.20  9:15 pm   Time and space could come in handy wouldn't you say?

      yes that's true

6.18.20  8:45 pm   do you worship the rhino god

      yes, if i can remember which one that is

6.18.20  8:37 pm   I seem to be on this endless cycle of loving everything I write and thinking I'm the best, and then being hit with the feeling of everything I've ever made is garbage. It's really hard to work when that feeling hits. Have you ever experienced this? How do you push past it? 

      have you thought about going for a promenade

6.18.20  7:58 pm   What year do you expect the world to end and why?

      it ends every moment, while simultanteously starting also

6.18.20  7:56 pm   how often do you feel creatively stuck?

      maybe 0 times per moment

6.18.20  7:55 pm   Have you considered being unreasonable?

      oh all the time, it's fun. which i think is reasonable

6.18.20  7:48 pm   My wife thinks your videos are silly but I think they're serious. Who's right?

      NO ONE

6.18.20  6:55 pm   How many different types of bird are there?

      just 2, bird and plane
